A4.text: Alpert and Leary co-authored LSD with Sidney Cohen and Lawrence Schiller in 1966.

A5.text: Alpert and Leary conducted research with Harvard Divinity School graduate student Walter Pahnke in his 1962 'Good Friday Experiment' with theology students, the first controlled, double-blind study of drugs and the mystical experience.
